body: 很急，希望得到大神的帮助。vx:an10246115
@isyanan1024 Hello, which adjustments need to be make in alphabets.py?(你好，请问alphabets.py需要调整什么啊?) I encounted this problem, too.(我也遇到了这个问题) Can you explain it in detailes, please.(你可以详细解释一下嘛？)
@JisongXie if you train.txt is 'curry'  'james'  'kobe' 'yanan'. your alphabets.py should be alphabet = """curyjamesan""".
@isyanan1024 Okay, I will have a try. Thanks!

@isyanan1024 I download the 3.6 million chinese characters dataset, adn download the train.txt and test.txt from [BaiduYunpan](https://pan.baidu.com/s/1rd4tm0sCq5fFgB2ziUxcrA)(password:w877), which is provided by the author@Sierkinhane . Modify the image path and txt path in crnn_main_v2.py. When I run it, it appears nan.

As you said, alphabets.py need to adjust, but the train.txt is like below:
![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28192557/63412520-7f01b680-c42a-11e9-8128-50a0bbca9c29.png)
So, you mean I extract the character after jpg in each line, and merge them together to be alphabet?

@isyanan1024 I try and it still output nan. I know the alphabets is set of the possible characters. 
I also adjust the learning rate. When the lr is set high, it's more quickly to output nan. It's confusing.
It's always output nan at the 1019th batch, even though I make lr smaller.
![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28192557/63416533-2504ef00-c432-11e9-85c3-f5846c153c6b.png)
@JisongXie you can change batchSize from 32 to 2.I do this and it works.

@isyanan1024 but it will train slow. Well, now I modify the param as below, it doesn't output nan tiil now.
![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28192557/63417137-474b3c80-c433-11e9-89ce-9ff04d017b94.png)

maybe you can try 4、8 or 16,and you should try this:
optimizer = optim.Adam(crnn.parameters(), lr=params.lr,betas=(params.beta1, 0.999))
@isyanan1024 yes, now I use the adam optimizer. I have a lot of gpu, but when I raise the batchsize up to e.g. 128, it will output nan, too. So I raise down the batchsize now. Thanks for your advice!
我试了好几天，我发现只要调GPU就完蛋，CPU跑的好好的，奇了怪了

@wi162yyxq yeah, I use the cpu to run, it work fine.(是的，我用CPU就可以跑)However, with gpu, I find it will finally get nan, and the loss go around 150.(但用gpu最后都会nan，并且loss在150左右波动) When I use cpu, the loss will go below 150.（使用cpu，loss可以降到150以下)
![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28192557/63481226-6693a980-c4c7-11e9-983b-860774848f40.png)
